Web 2.0 Industry And Ajax Community Boosted By Open Ajax Alliance

27 Sep 2006

Web 2.0 Industry And Ajax Community Boosted By Open Ajax Alliance The set of technologies known as "OpenAjax" being developed and facilitated by the alliance will provide the following benefits to Web developers: * Lower development costs and faster delivery of Web 2.0 innovations * Vendor choice and interoperability * Richer Web experience and greater collaboration that can be added incrementally to existing HTML Web sites or used for creating new applications

Ahti Kitsik
Java, Eclipse RCP, Python, Node.js, web apps developer
